$:/plugins/tg/tiddlersbar/button.creator: TonGerner

$:/plugins/tg/tiddlersbar/readme.text:
This plugin - based on Buggy j's [[StoryTopTabs plugin|http://bjtools.tiddlyspot.com/#StoryTopTabs]] - creates a 'Tiddlersbar' of open tiddlers (as tabs) on top of the screen. It works best in Zoomin view.
The Tiddlersbar can be toggled on/off (<>/<>) with a button in the Page toolbar and/or the View toolbar. <<< ''Note:''
''This plugin needs my $:/plugins/tg/layout plugin for general layout settings (available at http://tongerner.tiddlyspot.com/).'' <<< Settings for the layout can be found in ''~ControlPanel > Appearance > [[Plugin tweaks|$:/plugins/tg/layout/tweaks]]''.
$:/plugins/tg/tiddlersbar/readme.title: $:/plugins/tg/tiddlersbar/readme
$:/plugins/tg/tiddlersbar/readme.creator: TonGerner

$:/plugins/tg/tiddlersbar/settings.text:
!!Tiddlersbar settings @@.brown ''Toggle tiddlersbar in ~PageControls''@@
<$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/tg/tiddlersbar/button" tag="$:/tags/PageControls"> Button active @@.brown ''Toggle tiddlersbar in ~ViewToolbar ''@@
<$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/tg/tiddlersbar/button" tag="$:/tags/ViewToolbar"> Button active <> <> <> <> <> <> <> <>
<$button tooltip="Help"> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-open-window" $param="$:/plugins/tg/tiddlersbar/settings-help" height="380px" width="700px"/>Help
$:/plugins/tg/tiddlersbar/settings.title: $:/plugins/tg/tiddlersbar/settings
$:/plugins/tg/tiddlersbar/settings.creator: TonGerner
$:/plugins/tg/tiddlersbar/settings.caption: Tiddlersbar

$:/plugins/tg/tiddlersbar/settings-help.text:
|Item |Description |Default |h
|Toggle tiddlersbar in ~PageControls |'Toggle tiddlersbar' button in ~PageControls| <input type="checkbox" checked /> |
|Toggle tiddlersbar in ~ViewToolbar |'Toggle tiddlersbar' button in ~ViewToolbar| <input type="checkbox" /> |
|Left 'Tiddlersbar'  |Start (from the left) of the Tiddlersbar| 42px |
|Top 'Tiddlersbar' |Start (from the top) of the Tiddlersbar| 10px |
|Font size 'Tiddlersbar' |Font size of Tiddlersbar | 0.9em |
|Background color 'Tiddler tabs' |Background color of breadcrumbs | `<<colour tab-background>>` |
|Text color 'Tiddler tabs' |Text color of tiddler tabs | `<<colour tab-foreground>>` |
|Background color 'Tiddler tab selected' |Background color of selected tiddler tab| `<<colour tab-background-selected>>` |
|Text color 'Tiddler tab selected' |Text color of selected tiddler tab | `<<colour tab-foreground-selected>>` |
|Rounded corners 'tiddler tabs' |Rounded corners of tiddlersbar | 1px |
$:/plugins/tg/tiddlersbar/settings-help.title: $:/plugins/tg/tiddlersbar/settings-help
$:/plugins/tg/tiddlersbar/settings-help.creator: TonGerner

$:/plugins/tg/tiddlersbar/styles.text:
/* BREADCRUMBS TOP MENU */
.tgc-tiddlersbar {
     display: block;
     position: fixed;
     left: 0;
     top: {{!!top-tiddlersbar}};  /* vertical start of tiddlersbar 'menu' */
     width: calc(100% - 60px); /* right margin for '>>' icon */
     margin-left: {{!!left-tiddlersbar}};
     z-index: 900;
}

/* TIDDLERSBAR */
.tgc-tiddlersbar button {
     font-size: {{!!tiddlersbar-font-size}};
     color: {{!!tiddlersbar-text-color}};
     padding: 3px 5px 3px 5px;
     border: none;
     border-radius: {{!!tiddlersbar-border-radius}};
     background: none;
     background-color: {{!!tiddlersbar-color}};
     border-left: 1px solid #cccccc;
     border-top: 1px solid #cccccc;
     border-right: 1px solid #cccccc;
}

/* TIDDLERBAR SELECTED */
.tgc-tiddlersbar button.tgc-tiddlersbar-selected {
     color: {{!!tiddlersbar-selected-text-color}};
     background: none;
     background-color: {{!!tiddlersbar-selected-color}};
}
/* HOVER over 'x' */
.tgc-tiddlersbar button.tgc-x:hover {
     font-weight: bold;
}
.tgc-tiddlersbar button.tgc-tiddlersbar-selected.tgc-x:hover {
     font-weight: bold;
}
$:/plugins/tg/tiddlersbar/styles.title: $:/plugins/tg/tiddlersbar/styles
$:/plugins/tg/tiddlersbar/styles.creator: TonGerner

$:/plugins/tg/tiddlersbar/tiddlersbar.text:
<$list filter="[list[$:/StoryList]]" history="$:/HistoryList" variable="currentTab"> <$reveal type="match" state="$:/HistoryList!!current-tiddler" text=<>>
<$button to=<> class="tgc-tiddlersbar-selected" style="margin-right: -0.4em; border-right: 0.0em"> <$macrocall $name="currentTab" $type="text/plain" $output="text/plain"/> <$button message="tm-close-tiddler" param=<> class="tgc-tiddlersbar-selected tgc-x" style="border-left: 0.0em;">X
<$reveal type="nomatch" state="$:/HistoryList!!current-tiddler" text=<>>
<$button to=<> style="margin-right: 0.0em;" > <$macrocall $name="currentTab" $type="text/plain" $output="text/plain"/> <$button message="tm-close-tiddler" param=<> class="tgc-x"> X
$:/plugins/tg/tiddlersbar/tiddlersbar.title: $:/plugins/tg/tiddlersbar/tiddlersbar
$:/plugins/tg/tiddlersbar/tiddlersbar.creator: TonGerner
